# 

<span key="d93cc4a2e34846f7830bee3b160e00df"><span offset-key="d93cc4a2e34846f7830bee3b160e00df:0">Cold Outreach 101</span></span>

## 

<span key="6457c96b60af4df190a72d69c024204b"><span offset-key="6457c96b60af4df190a72d69c024204b:0">I just applied to a job, now what?</span></span>

-   

    <span key="b885c0cc8d1f4d1484f429a1b1fb4116">**Step 1:**<span offset-key="b885c0cc8d1f4d1484f429a1b1fb4116:1"> Identify who to reach out to at the company.</span></span>

    -   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

        <span key="a96bdcda97cb4b94b55623960127b5ce">**How do I find the right person to contact?**</span>

        -   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

            <span key="8ed1326ba70346f988559999ddf9bb43">**Use LinkedIn to find contacts**</span>

            <span key="ea8ab0b0a26a468aafa65982b60e5a2c">**Option 1:**<span offset-key="ea8ab0b0a26a468aafa65982b60e5a2c:1"> Navigate to the company's page on LinkedIn and the People tab. \*\*\*\*Search on keywords like "Engineering" or "Data Analyst"</span></span>

            <span key="ae503dfff3134d0db0da34c220b7ee07">**Option 2:**<span offset-key="ae503dfff3134d0db0da34c220b7ee07:1"> Enter this search term into Google: site:www.linkedin.com/in -inurl:dir “company name” “keyword: engineer, recruiter”</span></span>

        -   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

            <span key="d296be76615c484eb9130ab47e78507c">**For small companies (less than &lt;50 people)**</span>

            1.  <span class="r-1awozwy r-1nf4jbm r-6koalj r-18u37iz r-gg6oyi r-ubezar r-16dba41 r-135wba7 r-1m04atk r-1pyaxff" contenteditable="false" style="height:24px">1.</span>
                <span key="b61c3a0a319a4500bae5a205f0dc90b0">**Future Boss:**<span offset-key="b61c3a0a319a4500bae5a205f0dc90b0:1"> Search for CTO, Engineering Manager, or VP of Engineering/Data</span></span>

            2.  <span class="r-1awozwy r-1nf4jbm r-6koalj r-18u37iz r-gg6oyi r-ubezar r-16dba41 r-135wba7 r-1m04atk r-1pyaxff" contenteditable="false" style="height:24px">2.</span>
                <span key="12c65b561f1d4012b609b024b77d0104">**Future peer**<span offset-key="12c65b561f1d4012b609b024b77d0104:1">: Search for the title you are applying to. ➕ </span>*Bonus points if this peer has a similar background to you!*</span>

                <span key="ce8e6fc0d63a4f98800279fd32b459b0">**Future Boss:**<span offset-key="ce8e6fc0d63a4f98800279fd32b459b0:1"> Search for Engineering Manager, VP of Engineering/Data.</span></span>

            <span key="df77250974954629bb67b0c12f8784ce">**You can also use this template for applications that are submitted via email. This is a longer, cover letter style outreach email which can be great in situations where you know they will be reading it.**</span>

            <span key="8a4d498e02d24ffc808defe91bb9b28e"><span offset-key="8a4d498e02d24ffc808defe91bb9b28e:0">{name} – Good morning/afternoon!</span></span>

            <span key="d6957bfd89b046ca95aebf3526377e63"><span offset-key="d6957bfd89b046ca95aebf3526377e63:0">I am a recent graduate from the {program name} at Lambda School, a full-time intensive and immersive project -based curriculum program.             <span key="15e74441d5d24500a0c0ec851f0835f7"><span offset-key="15e74441d5d24500a0c0ec851f0835f7:0">I believe I’m a great fit for the role and here’s why {pick the top 3 things the company needs from the job description and connect them to yourself – the below is just an example – make it your own!}:</span></span>

            1.  <span class="r-1awozwy r-1nf4jbm r-6koalj r-18u37iz r-gg6oyi r-ubezar r-16dba41 r-135wba7 r-1m04atk r-1pyaxff" contenteditable="false" style="height:24px">1.</span>
                <span key="dc180754f0a24aa4b5caa5e12e8f0b2f"><span offset-key="dc180754f0a24aa4b5caa5e12e8f0b2f:0">I am a nerd about high quality, fast, and clean code. I am deeply comfortable with structured code, databases, object-oriented programming, and “specialty” languages.</span></span>

            2.  <span class="r-1awozwy r-1nf4jbm r-6koalj r-18u37iz r-gg6oyi r-ubezar r-16dba41 r-135wba7 r-1m04atk r-1pyaxff" contenteditable="false" style="height:24px">2.</span>
                <span key="0f5c21898d744305b5a1d30eb09d7a81"><span offset-key="0f5c21898d744305b5a1d30eb09d7a81:0">I am mercilessly self-motivated and as a result, take proactive actions seriously when working on a team. I am uncomfortable with leaving tasks undone and expectations un-communicated, so I’ll always be the person who ensures that the team is on the same page and that we are doing our best work together.</span></span>

            3.  <span class="r-1awozwy r-1nf4jbm r-6koalj r-18u37iz r-gg6oyi r-ubezar r-16dba41 r-135wba7 r-1m04atk r-1pyaxff" contenteditable="false" style="height:24px">3.</span>
                <span key="46822585c3d946939b46842ffa9b2551"><span offset-key="46822585c3d946939b46842ffa9b2551:0">I am passionate about translating technical decisions to non-technical audiences. While I love to get deep into the technicalities of SQL syntax as much as the next person, I cannot think of anything that irks me more than people with technical backgrounds speaking over the heads of their customers.</span></span>

            <span key="39068b6aa6ac40bf967ca67c770c6bde"><span offset-key="39068b6aa6ac40bf967ca67c770c6bde:0">I would love to connect and dive deeper into my background as well as what I can bring to the team. Are you available for a phone or video call on Thursday or Friday of this week?</span></span>

            <span key="3c7e47976ecd49ec8eee4192644973d5"><span offset-key="3c7e47976ecd49ec8eee4192644973d5:0">Thank you for your time and consideration, name contact</span></span>

        <span key="1993f06848234043b931333f439b1e15">**Email to your future peer**</span>

            <span key="668899e7ece84390bee27afe8ac7893b">**Peers that have a similar background or journey into tech as you including Lambda Alumni.**</span>

            <span key="52f3307062f140e5b1992175c3a4dadb">**SUBJECT:**<span offset-key="52f3307062f140e5b1992175c3a4dadb:1"> Connect?</span></span>

### 

<span key="f8a8d09a7ef94f848c0de299fa68e8dd"><span offset-key="f8a8d09a7ef94f848c0de299fa68e8dd:0">Templates for LinkedIn cold outreach</span></span>

<span key="f8ca403300884b2e8cec2ea66f438390">**Email has a much better response rate than LinkedIn connection requests + notes.**<span offset-key="f8ca403300884b2e8cec2ea66f438390:1"> Email is checked more often, can be forwarded to other teams, and can include a link to your resume. When in doubt, email your contact. However, if you can't find a reliable email or they seem especially active on LinkedIn, try to reach them there!</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="c7ed1555b32e49928d0f55c1fe6337cb">**LinkedIn notes with connection requests**</span>

    <span key="cef63c1dd8394470942c60de7fbc2a4a"><span offset-key="cef63c1dd8394470942c60de7fbc2a4a:0">Hey Alyse, I'm drawn to Odoo's mission and think my background in education could provide value for your data team. I would love to learn more about your path to work there. Can we connect?</span></span>

    <span key="eb217ca0ac9f42dbaabe16a811114cab"><span offset-key="eb217ca0ac9f42dbaabe16a811114cab:0">Hello Jerrard, I'm interested in Sculpt and trying to get a more realistic feel of the day to day responsibilities of a jr full stack engineer. What is one of the toughest parts about being a new engineer there?</span></span>

    <span key="85282547f54d436f8e4e29ea22fd0ab2"><span offset-key="85282547f54d436f8e4e29ea22fd0ab2:0">Hi Jasmine— I also went to the University of Utah, go utes!     <span key="9948b71fa7bb429f803e6703d6d836b4"><span offset-key="9948b71fa7bb429f803e6703d6d836b4:0">Hello Lisa, I'm really excited about the work you are doing at Bloom Health to increase access to mental health, and when I saw you also had a background in Psychology, I had to reach out! Can we connect?</span></span>

    <span key="e0cb3862c4354a5db3880d55ea10bccd"><span offset-key="e0cb3862c4354a5db3880d55ea10bccd:0">{name} — My passions include</span></span>

    1.  <span class="r-1awozwy r-1nf4jbm r-6koalj r-18u37iz r-gg6oyi r-ubezar r-16dba41 r-135wba7 r-1m04atk r-1pyaxff" contenteditable="false" style="height:24px">1.</span>
        <span key="2677657d5b094f3e978edfad3af99cd4"><span offset-key="2677657d5b094f3e978edfad3af99cd4:0">Designing beautiful applications</span></span>

    2.  <span class="r-1awozwy r-1nf4jbm r-6koalj r-18u37iz r-gg6oyi r-ubezar r-16dba41 r-135wba7 r-1m04atk r-1pyaxff" contenteditable="false" style="height:24px">2.</span>
        <span key="210d6a8c03ee4cb4a2b27cb810a2c19e"><span offset-key="210d6a8c03ee4cb4a2b27cb810a2c19e:0">Building things that matter</span></span>

    3.  <span class="r-1awozwy r-1nf4jbm r-6koalj r-18u37iz r-gg6oyi r-ubezar r-16dba41 r-135wba7 r-1m04atk r-1pyaxff" contenteditable="false" style="height:24px">3.</span>
        <span key="38d611ab178a434ca9a355e84931a8a9"><span offset-key="38d611ab178a434ca9a355e84931a8a9:0">Making financial education accessible to all. I've been following SmartWallet for the past few years and love the mission. Before transitioning to tech, I worked in finance- I want to find a way to get involved with you. Even if not immediately.</span></span>

    <span key="5e1378e5d5a749a89f5a3b668850a7b7"><span offset-key="5e1378e5d5a749a89f5a3b668850a7b7:0">Good Afternoon Meaghan! I recently applied to the Software Engineer position at Alkami and wondered if you had a few minutes to talk about the position. Are you free for 15 minutes this Friday?</span></span>

    <span key="0f748c24e51e46f0841628912ad13ad5"><span offset-key="0f748c24e51e46f0841628912ad13ad5:0">Hi Jill! I’m really excited about the POSITION role & the opportunity to work with STACK. When do you plan on starting to interview for this role?</span></span>

    <span key="67053cf0770f4b9b8b94653f9538a0da"><span offset-key="67053cf0770f4b9b8b94653f9538a0da:0">Hey Kelsey, I am thinking about applying for a software engineering role at \_</span>*\_*<span offset-key="67053cf0770f4b9b8b94653f9538a0da:2">\_\_ and I was wondering if I could talk to you about your experience working there. I really think that you guys are changing lives for the better and I want to get on board! Would you have time to do a quick call to just talk about how you've liked it, and specifically, what it's been like to be remote? Thank you!</span></span>

    <span key="eb7fe42389d9433e83953b5fa04e8814"><span offset-key="eb7fe42389d9433e83953b5fa04e8814:0">On the whole, we have found that email has a much better response rate than LinkedIn connection requests + notes. This is in part because you can follow up on email messages and because email is checked more often. When in doubt, email your contact.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="a36e221d00ae4baeb308e97d6aa6a2e1">**They accepted my LinkedIn request but didn't respond**<span offset-key="a36e221d00ae4baeb308e97d6aa6a2e1:1"> 😅 </span>**— now what?**</span>

    <span key="e0996f87ad4644e89eb3b2c33c902fa6">**Follow up with them! You can now send a message without character limits, use that!**</span>

    <span key="39ac82dcda1a492d856a641ea64913f3"><span offset-key="39ac82dcda1a492d856a641ea64913f3:0">Thank you for accepting my connection request! I really think I could be a great fit for the Front End Engineering role, and would love to learn a bit more about the position and what you are looking for in your next hire. Do you have time for a quick phone \*\*call this week?</span></span>

### 

<span key="cc133e83e6c447ae9f514c639fa7e0b6"><span offset-key="cc133e83e6c447ae9f514c639fa7e0b6:0">Templates to continue the conversation!</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="89c390f108ae466b80fbbd7f4ef240a4">**They replied with a general, non-committal response.**</span>

    <span key="5ed4a496af0849d5ab2be296e8aef4af">**Ask if they can hop on a 📞 or Zoom call!**</span>

    <span key="584dfed5d37a44af9b4b517a9e393701">**Reply to the same email thread with:**<span offset-key="584dfed5d37a44af9b4b517a9e393701:1"> Thank you so much for getting back to me, I imagine this is a really busy time, so I appreciate it! I would love to learn more about what you all are really needing in your next engineer hire. Could we hop on a 15-minute phone call this week, maybe Wednesday or Thursday? If not, any chance I could run a few questions by you here?</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="b7622fe643fd4c8bbf67f2e280928fae">**They replied and said that they aren't the hiring manager for this role.**</span>

    <span key="02c08ce27e4e47df8cfc0af99c4c8bf9">**Reply to the same email thread with:**<span offset-key="02c08ce27e4e47df8cfc0af99c4c8bf9:1"> Thank you so much for getting back to me and letting me know! I apologize for the ping out of the blue in that case! I have a few questions about this role and what the team is looking for — any chance you could point me to who would be better on the team to bother with these? Any insight you can provide would be so helpful, thank you in advance!</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="99675d5335aa42c6927b2659d65dc4e0">**They told me I didn't have enough experience.**</span>

    <span key="5fc84d3b79d440feb88059dd5160b09f">**It can be discouraging to receive a version of the message: "We really are looking for people with more experience for this role." Never fear! You can work with this — below is an example of a great response to this common response.**</span>

    <span key="9a1b7a5305834ba7b20475d3b7fb269b"><span offset-key="9a1b7a5305834ba7b20475d3b7fb269b:0">{name} — thank you so much for letting me know. I absolutely understand that your team is looking for someone with enough experience to jump in to {company name}'s codebase and ramp up quickly. From my time building in the fast-paced world of Lambda School, I am deeply comfortable working through complicated codebases, unblocking myself, and mentoring other developers, which are all skills that I know could add a lot of value to the {company name} engineering team. Additonally, I have over 3+ years of experience in management and customer-facing roles, which feels particularly relevant to this role's client-facing responsibilities.</span></span>

    <span key="e48d6b7d1df44f14923502ffdf18bd05"><span offset-key="e48d6b7d1df44f14923502ffdf18bd05:0">Given this experience and passion, how would I be able to stay in the recruiting process for this role?</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="c4367769b37340c0897cc8bf796e2a1f">**They told that me the role closed but to keep an eye out for future roles.**</span>

    <span key="9b35f6d9dda247a19f470b987f676fb6">**This happens all the time! Hiring moves fast, which is the main reason we recommend reaching out within 24 hours of applying. Make it very easy for your contact to help you with those “future opportunities”. Do a quick search of their open roles, keeping an eye out for stepping stone jobs like Solutions, Support, and Implementation Engineer. Apply to those and then send the below**<span offset-key="9b35f6d9dda247a19f470b987f676fb6:1"> ⤵️</span></span>

    <span key="1af89507cfa44e68b3c811f3578a0892">**Reply to the same email thread with:**<span offset-key="1af89507cfa44e68b3c811f3578a0892:1"> Thank you so much for getting back to me and so glad you were able to find a great fit for this role! I'd also love to stay in touch regarding future opportunities at {company name}. I am also really excited about these two roles and just applied to them:</span></span>

    -   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

        <span key="9faca57cd1154e6bab1bbe79da4530bc"><span offset-key="9faca57cd1154e6bab1bbe79da4530bc:0">API Engineer {hyperlink to job description}</span></span>

    -   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

        <span key="fd78c56d6ffc466ba67505ea8943e0d8"><span offset-key="fd78c56d6ffc466ba67505ea8943e0d8:0">Implementation Engineer {hyperlink to job description}</span></span>

    <span key="8401b6d75f29479d825fe0873920e433"><span offset-key="8401b6d75f29479d825fe0873920e433:0">Any chance you are involved in hiring for those roles right now or know of someone who would be a good contact for them?</span></span>

    <span key="b584a80bfc0f43a7890eac689de184aa"><span offset-key="b584a80bfc0f43a7890eac689de184aa:0">All the best and thank you again for your help!</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="fddf7680a4f7468ab7d30a81aed92e88">**They said they can meet for a call!**<span offset-key="fddf7680a4f7468ab7d30a81aed92e88:1"> 🎉 </span>**Now what?**</span>

    <span key="e05f26b30a2e4627becfff26e61a381a"><span offset-key="e05f26b30a2e4627becfff26e61a381a:0">First, give yourself a huge pat on the back — you just networked yourself into a phone screen, informal or not! Make sure to review the document below to get prepared for this call and make the most of it. Jump in with a coach during #job\_search office hours, as well, to prep! \*\*\*\*</span></span>

    <span key="01004c782e2545c6b7b24886b8bf1605"><span offset-key="01004c782e2545c6b7b24886b8bf1605:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://www.notion.so/Informational-Interviews-ba425804036f435ca49fc1a2ecc1d090" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="1a9ddf77d4634791b2eafb9e29cc5510" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-5933_259-5934-237__"><span data-key="4eb0af5f921a462586ea8edc526b6a18"><span data-offset-key="4eb0af5f921a462586ea8edc526b6a18:0">Informational Interviews</span></span></span></a><span key="7ab928a169b7435db6717b27b15c0631"><span offset-key="7ab928a169b7435db6717b27b15c0631:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>
